comments:

modification, though I believe I've seen it when launching a non-external
generic server); the following stack trace shows up when starting the server (it
 doesn't appear to negatively impact the server functionality...):

...
org.eclipse.wst.server.core FINEST    14/06/05 20:42.42.265 ->- Adding server
listener to notification manager:

org.eclipse.wst.server.core FINEST    14/06/05 20:42.42.265 Starting server: BEA
WebLogic Server v9.0(Generic), launchMode: run

server start timeout

added timeout to all server types, the fix is in HEAD
